column2: Mabel Suffield dies after six days in a diabetic coma.

column1: * 1907 - Swedish author Astrid Lindgren is born.
* 1955 - The first episode of The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series) of The Fellowship of the Ring airs on the BBC Third Programme.
* 1962 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to H. Cotton Minchin (14 November 1962).
* 1964 - The sixth episode of the Princess-serialization of The Hobbit is published.
* 1986 - The Shaping of Middle-earth is published in the US.
* 1990 - The War of the Ring is published in the US.
* 2003 - Tolkien Through Russian Eyes is published.

column3: travels to Gondolin in order to deliver Ulmos message to Turgon.
